==== Notes ====
* 1 Dapper Drake Flight 4: Choosing French keymap when booting install CD (on first splash screen) disabled arrows
* 2 Need to change  Driver "vesa" to Driver "i810" in /etc/X11/xorg.conf (section "Device")
* 3 Never wake up
* 4 See http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=26623
* 5 You need the kernel module fsam7440 to activate WLAN: http://fsam7440.sourceforge.net/
* 6 See http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=189540
* 7 Edgy Eft Dvd beta release
